content: Social media has undoubtedly transformed marketing and advertising, and its role will continue to evolve over time. However, it's hard to say whether traditional forms of advertising, like TV commercials or billboards, will become completely obsolete. There will always be a need for different forms of advertising, and some audiences may still respond more to traditional formats. It is likely that we will see more integration of traditional and digital forms of advertising to create a more seamless, multi-channel experience for audiences. Lastly, another factor is that despite the fact that social media has disrupted the advertising and marketing landscape, it is still not able to reach all demographics that are accessible through traditional forms of advertising.
